column5: I'm heading to Jamaica,  Montego Bay February 27th to March 6th just curious if anyone has been recently and could share some things to do and  see i was thinking of bringing a fly rod to try around the beach just  not sure how to bring a 5 foot rod tube to jamaica   anyhow any help would be great thanks Jeff
Hey Jeff, not sure about Jamaica but why are you going when you just got some new toys  Good luck on your research bud.

HAHA , i'm gonna get some ice fishing in before then no worries lol but if i go away for a week with the Girlfriend that give me a whole week of brownie points for fishing the rest of march  cant wait to get on the ice and try out the new finder and rod !!!! Thanks again
